item.title: The dream of an independent judiciary
item.description: Nothing reveals the story of why we failed to institutionalise democracy in Bangladesh better than our failure to build an independent judiciary. Though it is clearly stated in our constitution, it took us 53 years or so to lay its final foundation stone. What edifice we will build on this foundation lies in our future.

item.title: Dear mothers, stop coddling your sons
item.description: Mothers are the epitome of sacrifice, the symbol of eternal kindness and the always-available emotional anchor. They will protect their children with their lives.
